articles.title: Rickie Fowler fails to qualify for U.S. Open; 57-year-old Fran Quinn makes field - ESPN
articles.description: Fran Quinn, 57, qualified for the U.S. Open on Monday, while Rickie Fowler and former NFL running back Danny Woodhead were among the notables who failed to make the field for next week's major championship at The Country Club in Brookline, Massachusetts.
